text: ci ʙad ast holi sumo va holi ulamoi sumo, vaqte ki mardumro ʙa neki (ja'ne, to'at) farmon medihed va xudro faromus mekuned? Va mardumro ʙa nekii ʙuzurg amr namekuned, ki vaj islom ast va hol on ki Tavrotro mexoned, ki dar on imon ovardan ʙa rasuli Alloh sallallohu alajhi va sallam amr suda va sifathojas zikr sudaand. Ojo aqlro kor namefarmoed
